name: Transit Mapping Symposium - Seoul 20-21 April 2020
content: The Transit Mapping Symposium is a yearly international gathering of transport networks professionals, a unique opportunity to share achievements, challenges and vision. Our participants and speakers include experts from all fields of the industry: – Mapmakers – Network Operators – Transport Authorities – Digital Platforms – Designers Discover the speakers list and venue on our website: https://transitmappingsymposium.org/ - - - inat is a Paris based mapping and wayfinding consultancy, a co-organizer of the Transit Mapping Symposium. Explore all our metro maps and other works at www.inat.fr - - -
